description: Medium humanoid (any race), any non-lawful alignment

actions.name: Lightfooted
actions.desc: The swashbuckler can take the Dash or Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The swashbuckler makes three attacks: one with a dagger and two with its rapier.

actions.name: Rapier
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 5 ft./80 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage.

name: Ranaer Neverember
